title: A postal clerk ending a transaction
context: Thank a customer and hand them their post office receipt.

content.bestLine: Here's your receipt, thank you for choosing our service

neutral.text: You're all set, receipt is here
Here's your receipt, have a great day
Thank you for your business, receipt is here
You're good to go, receipt is ready

formal.text: Your transaction is complete, here is your receipt
Thank you for using our postal services, receipt provided
Here is your receipt, we appreciate your business
Your receipt is ready, thank you for choosing us
We appreciate your patronage, receipt is attached
Your transaction has been successfully completed, receipt provided

lines.speaker: Postal Clerk
lines.text: Here's your receipt, thank you for choosing our service

lines.speaker: Customer
lines.text: Thank you, have a great day

lines.speaker: Postal Clerk
lines.text: Thank you for using our postal services, receipt provided

lines.speaker: Customer
lines.text: You're welcome, thanks for the help
